name: Rico Richie
text: Best salads and the Mozzarella Pizza pies?? mmmmmgood

name: Brandon Beevers
text: Pizza is great. Reason for the 4 stars? Their wings could use some help. They taste like chicken nugges from burger king with a little sauce on top. I think Howies needs to go where pizza hut goes for their wings and sauce. I order wings from the hut and pizza from howies for a good meal. And the soda is over priced.

name: Racso G
text: Pizza is really good. One of my favorites. Glad they are in the neighborhood. But you cannot call this buffalo chicken wings. Look at them. They look like somebody put some buffalo sauce on kids chicken wings. There's sauce on top only, barely on the sides, and nothing at the bottom.

name: Mateo H. RODRIGUEZ
text: Awesome Hawaiian ham pineapple bacon and Olive mushroom pizza killer

name: J. R. Lewis
text: Storefront takeout with great pizza. Known for flavored crusts, the pizza is tasty, the service polite and quick.

name: brian Prine
text: Good crust dodgy service. They have one edge on all pizza places; Their crust is really good. Beyond that, their pizza is average. The thing I didn't like is the dodgy pricing. There were no prices on the menu when I ordered at the store. I ‚Ä¶More

name: MARGUERIET Gonzalez

name: Chris Mattson
text: Ease of use of online ordering was pretty easy but they got my order wrong twice once with my pizza which was supposed to have bell pepper and my salad which was supposed to have feta cheese! They charged me for em..$1.50 and 75¬¢! I wasn't gonna drive back!

text: The pizza was great! It's a new place so I wasn't sure how it was going to turn out. Although it takes a little longer time for the pizza to be ready. But once the pizza was ready, and we ate it. For me, it was worth the wait! The pizza was great! Hope this place gets more well known.

name: tamara nigh
text: Almost got ran off the road by one of their girl drivers in a white car she needs to slow down on Rosedale Highway she was going 70mph .But the pizza there is great. So I give it 5 stars .

name: Sean Butler
text: Despite the silly name, the pizza is good, always fresh and the flavored crust is a great touch!

name: Christine Maness
text: They make thin, regular and thick crusts as well as gluten free.the best ones are the meat eaters and Asian Chicken. The crust on regulars is garlicliky and full of flavor. ‚Ä¶More
